TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementDateTimeConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供将 DMTF 日期时间和时间间隔转换为符合 CLR 的 和 格式（或执行相反转换）的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to convert DMTF datetime and time intervals to CLR-compliant and format and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime ToDateTime(string dmtfDate) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToDateTime (dmtfDate As String) As DateTime

param.name: dmtfDate
param.span: 用 DMTF 格式表示日期时间的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the datetime in DMTF format.

summary.span: 将给定的 DMTF 日期时间转换为 。

span.span: Converts a given DMTF datetime to .

summary.span: 返回的 将基于系统的当前时区。

span.span: The returned will be in the current time zone of the system.

returns.span: ，它表示给定的 DMTF 日期时间。

span.span: A that represents the given DMTF datetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 中的日期和时间表示为 DMTF 日期时间格式。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. 此格式在 WMI SDK 文档中进行了介绍。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF datetime 字符串具有此 datetime 字符串表示的 UTC 偏移量。A DMTF datetime string has an UTC offset which this datetime string represents. 在转换到期间 ，UTC 偏移量用于将日期转换为当前时区。During conversion to , the UTC offset is used to convert the date to the current time zone. 根据 DMTF 格式，特定字段可以用字符 "\*" 表示。According to DMTF format, a particular field can be represented by the character '\*'. 这会转换为 可以在中表示的此字段的值 。This will be converted to the value of this field that can be represented in . ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例将 DMTF 日期时间字符串转换为 。The following example converts a DMTF datetime string into a . [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 中的日期和时间表示为 DMTF 日期时间格式。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. 此格式在 WMI SDK 文档中进行了介绍。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. 所表示的 DMTF 日期时间字符串将与当前时区的 UTC 偏移量有关。The DMTF datetime string represented will be with respect to the UTC offset of the current time zone. DMTF 中的最低精度为微秒;在中 ，最低精度为 ，相当于100毫微秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which are equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在转换过程中， 转换为微秒并舍入为最接近的微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例将给定的转换 为 DMTF 日期时间格式。The following example converts a given to DMTF datetime format. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 中的时间间隔表示为 DMTF 日期时间格式。Time interval in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. 此格式在 WMI SDK 文档中进行了介绍。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 中的最低精度为微秒;在中 ，最低精度为 ，相当于100毫微秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which is equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在转换过程中， 转换为微秒并舍入为最接近的微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例将给定的转换 为 DMTF 时间间隔。The following example converts a given to DMTF time interval.
